013package org.apache.juneau.http.header;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.Utils2.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
019
020/**
021 * Represents a validator value.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * <h5 class='figure'>Example</h5>
025 * <p class='bcode'>
026 *    ETag: "123456789"    – A strong ETag validator
027 *    ETag: W/"123456789"  – A weak ETag validator
028 * </p>
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common</a>
032 *    <li class='extlink'><a class="doclink" href="https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html">Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1</a>
033 * </ul>
034 */
035public class EntityTag {
036
037   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
038   // Static
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040
041   private final String value;
042   private final boolean isWeak, isAny;
043
044   /**
045    * Static creator.
046    *
047    * @param value The validator string value.
048    * @return A new header bean or <jk>null</jk> if the value was <jk>null</jk>.
049    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If attempting to set an invalid entity tag value.
050    */
051   public static EntityTag of(Object value) {
052      Object o = unwrap(value);
053      return o == null ? null : new EntityTag(o.toString());
054   }
055
056   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
057   // Instance
058   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
059
060   /**
061    * Constructor.
062    *
063    * @param value The validator string value.
064    * @throws IllegalArgumentException If attempting to set an invalid entity tag value.
065    */
066   public EntityTag(String value) {
067      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
068
069      value = StringUtils.trim(emptyIfNull(value));
070      isWeak = value.startsWith("W/");
071      isAny = "*".equals(value);
072
073      if (! isAny) {
074         if (isWeak)
075            value = value.substring(2);
076         if (value.length() > 1 && value.charAt(0) == '"' && value.charAt(value.length()-1) == '"')
077            value = value.substring(1, value.length()-1);
078         else
079            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid value for entity-tag: ["+(isWeak ? ("W/"+value) : value)+"]");
080      }
081      this.value = value;
082
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Returns the validator value stripped of quotes and weak tag.
087    *
088    * @return The validator value.
089    */
090   public String getEntityValue() {
091      return value;
092   }
093
094   /**
095    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the weak flag is present in the value.
096    *
097    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the weak flag is present in the value.
098    */
099   public boolean isWeak() {
100      return isWeak;
101   }
102
103   /**
104    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the validator string value is <c>*</c>.
105    *
106    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the validator string value is <c>*</c>.
107    */
108   public boolean isAny() {
109      return isAny;
110   }
111
112   @Override
113   public String toString() {
114      return (isWeak ? "W/" : "") + (isAny() ? "*" : ('"' + value + '"'));
115   }
116}
